completedFixes: Fixed import errors (named vs default exports)

Added proper navigation with Close button
Integrated with HomePage tool flow like other tools

recentDecisions.decision: Make ExtractPagesTool consistent with other tools
recentDecisions.rationale: All tools should follow the same pattern: receive files, onComplete, onClose props
recentDecisions.impact: Consistent UX flow, proper navigation, unified architecture

recentDecisions.decision: Auto-load first file when component mounts
recentDecisions.rationale: User has already selected files on HomePage, tool should immediately work with them

fixedIssues.impact: Tool now works seamlessly with HomePage file selection

fixedIssues.solution: Added Close button and onClose handler like other tools

fixedIssues.issue: Import errors for Button, Icon, ProgressBar
fixedIssues.solution: Changed from named imports to default imports
fixedIssues.impact: Fixed build errors and component rendering
